To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for the jurisdiction of courts of the United States and of the States over certain foreign entities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Stopping Foreign Businesses Sanctuary Act of 2018
This bill authorizes federal and state courts to exercise jurisdiction over certain foreign entities that conduct commercial activities in the United States.
